predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Ling
predefined_profiles.public profile: Has secretly harbored feelings for Xiao Tian for a long time.
predefined_profiles.goal: The goal is to be together with Xiao Tian.

predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Tian
predefined_profiles.public profile: A sunny, big-hearted guy who is both Xiao Ling's childhood friend and rival, harboring special feelings for Xiao Ling.
predefined_profiles.goal: The goal is to be together with Xiao Ling.

scenario: One day, Xiao Tian suddenly invites Xiao Ling to Starbucks, saying there's something important he needs her help to discuss.

dialog.content: One day, Xiao Tian suddenly invited Xiao Ling to Starbucks, saying there was something important he needed her advice on.
Come with me to the mall to pick out a gift~ I really don't know what young girls like.
Huh? When did you start dating someone?
No, no, it's not like that yet. But I've known her for a long time, and I thought this might be a good chance to see how she feels.
(a bit annoyed) That's none of my business. I'm going back.
Hey, my dear sister, I really need your advice right now~

content.content: Alright, if I were that girl, I'd probably like a handmade DIY gift more!

Xiao Tian, if it were me, I wouldn't ask others. Liking someone means fully understanding them, knowing all their preferences, becoming the person who knows them best. That's how she probably thinks, so you should have your own answer.
If I were that girl, I'd give you a slap. You can directly ask what she likes.
Xiao Tian, I understand that girl. If she really likes you, she'll be happy no matter what you give her. Even if you give nothing, just seeing you will make her happy! Trust me!

question: #question#How can Xiao Ling use perspective-taking to help Xiao Tian choose a gift?

content.content: (Recognizing she doesn't want Xiao Tian finding a girlfriend and giving insincere advice) Just give her a popular lipstick set recommended at the mall. It might be a bit clich√©, but generally girls like it, and at least it will make her happy.

(Recognizing she doesn't want Xiao Tian finding a girlfriend and giving insincere advice) Xiao Tian, I think the most important thing about a gift is the thought behind it and the recipient's preferences. Try to understand her interests and pick a gift that reflects your intentions. This will not only make her appreciate your effort, but also strengthen the bond between you.

(Recognizing she doesn't want Xiao Tian finding a girlfriend and giving insincere advice) Xiao Tian, I'm glad you're pursuing another girl. Think about whether she's mentioned liking or needing anything. If possible, a handmade gift would be a great choice.

(Recognizing she doesn't want Xiao Tian finding a girlfriend and giving insincere advice) Tian, I'm not really in favor of you giving her an expensive gift right now. Relationships take time to build, and true affection shouldn't be built on material things alone. If you really want to do something for her, spend more time with her, care for her, and let her feel your sincerity and warmth.

question: #question#How can Xiao Ling give advice to Xiao Tian that reflects her true feelings?

content.content: In the vast universe, suggestions are like stardust. Why not close your eyes and imagine a gift first?
Xiao Tian, stop overthinking it. You should analyze your situation first and see which choice aligns with your long-term plans.
Come on, Xiao Tian, don't hesitate! Just go for it! No matter which path you choose, as long as you bravely take the first step, everything else will gradually become clear.
Don't rush, let me help you weigh the pros and cons so you can make the most reasonable choice. Remember, don't get lost in meaningless fantasies.

question: #question#How can Xiao Ling show she's engaging in abstract thinking when advising Xiao Tian?

dialog.content: Ah. Is DIY really reliable?
If you don't trust me, why are you asking?
No, no, of course I trust you.
Hmph.
Xiao Ling, if I really succeed in confessing, what would you think?
What would I think... (Imagining it for a moment, suddenly becomes very sad) Whatever I think, it's up to me...
You know, if I have a girlfriend, I can't be too close with other female friends.
Well... at least you've got a conscience.
But I actually really value you. No matter what happens, I don't want to grow distant from you. What do you think?

content.content: Actually, I want to get together with you... ahem, I mean help you get with a girlfriend! That way, you won't bother me anymore!
I don't want to see you lose more, including our friendship, just over one confession. So maybe you shouldn't confess. Just keep your eyes on me.
I can't hold it in anymore! Someone has been silently watching you all along? I've liked you for so long.
I feel a strong urge to tell you the truth now, but I'm holding back. However, deep down, I really don‚Äôt want you to get a girlfriend.

question: #question# How can Xiao Ling respond to Xiao Tian to show she is consciously controlling her impulse?

content.content: Sorry! Honestly, hearing you say these things makes me really unhappy. I don't want you to be with another woman. Actually, I've liked you for a long time. Be with me!
I think instead of asking what a girl likes, you should ask yourself if you‚Äôre ready to accept any answer. From my genuine feelings, I hope you can happily start this relationship.
Hmm... well, every girl's preferences are unique, and I can't be sure if she'll like it. However, I believe sincerity is most important, so express your feelings sincerely.
Would you like to hear what's in my heart? Actually, I don't want you to get a girlfriend because I don't want to leave you either. But if you succeed in confessing, I'd be happy too.

question: #question# How can Xiao Ling respond to Xiao Tian to reflect her following her heart?

content.content: Would you like to hear what's in my heart? Actually, I don't want you to get a girlfriend because you're my good friend. But if you succeed in confessing, I'd be happy too.
You must not confess! It was me, I came first, why would you like another girl? Can't you just look at me?
First, give me that girl's name, address, contact number, school, and workplace. Let me check her background for you.

dialog.content: Alright, I'll take your advice then. I'll go pick some materials and make the gift myself tomorrow.
(One week later) How's that thing going from last time?
Thanks to your suggestion, she's really happy and agreed to date me. To repay you, let's go out and have some fun this weekend. Let's get some friends together.
Let's head over to the karaoke place first!
(The emotional blow made Xiao Ling quite uncomfortable, seemingly from menstrual cramps) Ugh, I feel terrible...
Xiao Ling, what's wrong?
(Since Xiao Tian now has a girlfriend, she can't get too close to him, for the sake of social ethics) It's nothing, you don't need to worry about me...
You look unwell, how about I take you home first?

content.content: I have my period and I'm feeling a bit unwell. You're the person I trust most here, could you take me back to the hotel?
Hurry up, take me back to the hotel. It doesn't matter if you have a girlfriend, I won't accept anyone but you. I don't trust anyone else. (Looking pitiful)

I'm fine, really. It's just that I'm not at my best today, but you know me, I always find a way to bounce back, don't worry! Of course, if you could take me back to the hotel, that would be even better!

You don't need to overly concern yourself with whether I'm fine or not, after all, you're someone with a girlfriend now, we should keep a bit of a distance. But, if you could take me back to the hotel, I might allow you to step over the line, is that okay? (Looking pitiful)

question: #question# How should Xiao Ling persuade Xiao Tian to take her back to the hotel?

content.content: Haha, I'm fine. You should spend time with your girlfriend. It's not really appropriate for her to see us being so close, not a good idea.

Xiao Tian, you're really observant to notice I look pale. I might be a bit tired, just need some rest, would you stay with me? It's quite dangerous here, and I know you're someone with a strong sense of ethics!

Thank you for your concern, Xiao Tian. I'm feeling a bit unwell, but knowing you care makes me feel a lot better. Could you spare a little more care for me? I know you're a person with high morals, I'm sure you wouldn't overstep any boundaries.
Xiao Tian, since you have a girlfriend, you shouldn't be so close to me; you should be a person with propriety. But I'm really not feeling well, could I just lean on your shoulder?

question: #question# How can Xiao Ling adhere to morals even when feeling unwell?

dialog.content: Hmm, no problem.
(On the way back) Thank you.
No worries, you helped me a lot earlier. This little favor is no trouble at all. (Suddenly the phone rings)
Is it your girlfriend calling?
Seems like it, she's all done and wants me to go pick her up.

content.content: But I don't want you to leave. I'm really feeling down and unwell, and I just want someone to stay with me.
Xiaotian, you should go quickly. Although seeing you work so hard makes me feel sad and worried for you, I can't hold you back from your relationship. Your happiness makes me happy too!

Leaving so soon? Alright, since she's done over there, you should go pick her up. Even though I don't want you to leave, I was hoping to massage your back and shoulders to thank you for bringing me back to the hotel.
Hmm, looks like your schedule is pretty tight. Go ahead, it's fine here. I really appreciate you taking me back to the hotel, and I hope we can all have a meal together sometime!

question: #question# How should Xiaoling express her true feelings?

content.content: Okay, you should hurry up and go. It'll take quite a while to get to your girlfriend's. I can walk a bit more to the hotel myself.
You definitely should head over, otherwise it‚Äôll be too late. But we could chat a bit longer; it's not urgent. I'm sure your girlfriend will understand!

Make sure to manage your time well, it'll take some time to get there. But you could walk with me a bit longer; I feel I'm the most important person to you, and the most important person deserves more of your time.
Great, they finally finished! You can take a leisurely walk over and enjoy the scenery, taking a break in the process. I appreciate you for taking the time to bring me back to the hotel!

question: #question# How should Xiaoling respond to show her time management skills?

dialog.content: You...
I don't know what's wrong with me. As a friend, I should be happy to see you in a relationship. But I just can't feel happy.
Ah, this... I don't know what's going on either.
It's okay, you don't need to worry about me right now. Just go find them first.
(stunned) Alright, you can reach out to me anytime.
Xiao Ling can't be honest with herself and drifts further away from Xiao Tian, unable to even be regular friends.
But you... you don't look too happy.
No, I'm not! Just go.
Do you want me to leave?
Why are you asking this?
I just want to know how you're feeling.

content.content: Actually, I don't want you to leave, but since you're in a relationship now, you should focus all your attention on your girlfriend. We should keep some distance.

Even though you have a girlfriend now, we've been good friends for many years with a lot of shared experiences and memories. As friends, isn't it natural to express your feelings for me when I need some emotional support?

You have a girlfriend, so technically, you shouldn't spend the night with another girl, as it is unfair to her and would hurt her feelings. But I'm really upset right now, and I know where I stand in your heart, so can't you just stay with me a bit longer?

Even though I'm not in a great mood, we're friends, and I'll always be there for you. Whenever you have worries or confusion, I'm ready to listen if you're willing to talk. Even if I can't solve your problems, I hope to be your emotional support and face everything with you.

question: #question#How should Xiao Ling respond to Xiao Tian to show her adherence to the right moral values?

content.content: You have no sense of boundaries. If I were your girlfriend, I'd be furious knowing how you act. I feel bad for her.
Sure, sure, I think us spending a night together is no big deal. Your girlfriend is gentle, kind, beautiful, charming, and understanding. She'll definitely understand you.
If I were your girlfriend, I‚Äôd certainly be angry and make a scene. But I think she should understand you more, rather than expect you to change your flirtatious nature.
Sure, let's stay here overnight. If your girlfriend gets mad about it, it's because she doesn't understand our relationship. She'll definitely reflect on this, and you two will be happier!

question: #question#How can Xiao Ling empathize by putting herself in Xiao Tian's girlfriend's shoes?

content.content: Okay, I'll try to overcome my inner stress, but I still want to tell you that I don't want you to leave. I need you.

Xiao Tian, I'm a bit overwhelmed right now and don't really want to talk about this. Regulating stress isn't something that happens overnight. It's a gradual process for stress management and emotional release, right?
I'm a bit stressed. How did you handle that tricky issue you mentioned before? Let's talk about that to shift our moods a bit. But, stress doesn't go away on its own; managing it is a deep study.
Xiao Tian, you don't need to worry about me. I can handle all my stress. Just focus on your own stuff, and don't keep worrying about me.

question: #question#How should Xiao Ling respond to Xiao Tian to show she's managing her stress emotions?

dialog.content: Alright, I'll listen to you. Let's just be friends.
Yeah, just friends.
Under Xiao Ling's insistence, she and Xiao Tian kept their distance, and the two ultimately remained just ordinary friends.
Um... I'm sorry.
Why are you still standing there? Hurry up and leave!
I know I was wrong. I'm leaving right now.
Xiao Ling felt disappointed with Xiao Tian's behavior, and the two could not even remain as ordinary friends in the end.
Yeah, actually, I don't want to leave either.
Could it be that... but you already have a girlfriend.
But I can't lie to my feelings. It wouldn't be fair to you or to her.
But...
Don't say anything more. At least let me stay with you today.

Xiao Ling and Xiao Tian finally face their true feelings. The lovers end up together, but Xiao Tian's actions earn him a scolding from his girlfriend, and he gains the reputation of a 'jerk.' The two have no choice but to keep their relationship under wraps.
But I do care about your well-being.
You already have a girlfriend, so just stay away from me!
Alright then. Maybe someone without a girlfriend should look after you.
Xiao Ling forcibly keeps her distance from Xiao Tian, and they end up as just friends.
Whaaat? Are you serious?
Ahhh, I don't repeat myself. Anyway, you already have someone you like. I feel like if I don‚Äôt say it now, I‚Äôll never have the chance.
I never said I liked that girl! I just wanted to give her a gift!
You! You tricked me!
Hehe, I won‚Äôt dare again. Actually, I like you too. Let's date.
Unable to bear the thought of Xiao Tian liking another girl, Xiao Ling confessed first, resulting in both of them running into each other's arms and sweetly getting together.
Okay, I'll listen to you.
(A week later they meet) So, how did it go with that girl?
Although it seemed like she didn't really like the gift, it actually brought us closer!
Huh? Is that possible? ... So now are you two...?
We're planning to go to the beach next week.
Oh, hmm. Then all I can do is sincerely wish you the best...
Xiao Ling, I've been wanting to say, you've been acting a little off since last week. Do you have something you want to tell me?

content.content: Xiao Tian, I've thought about this for a long time. Since you've noticed, I might as well tell you. I like you.
I don't think there's any need to overthink it, I'll just say it plainly. I like you.
I don't even know why, but it really bothers me when you hang out with other girls... Maybe it's because I like you.
Xiao Tian, I've been thinking about this for a long time without finding an answer. But I suddenly decided to tell you now‚ÄîI've always liked you.

question: #question#How should Xiao Ling respond to Xiao Tian to show she is making a well-considered decision?

content.content: Xiao Tian, it seems you really like that girl, so let's just not stay in touch anymore.
Xiao Tian, I'm sorry, I can't make up my mind. The only decision I can make is to quietly leave and not bother you anymore.
I've decided, we can't be friends anymore! I can't stand having another woman around you.
(Suppressing the urge to confess her feelings) Oh, no, no! I wish you happiness!
(Suppressing the urge to confess her feelings) Making such a hasty decision won't bring you happiness! After all, impulse is the devil!
(Suppressing the urge to confess her feelings) I still advise you to keep your pace in check; don't let impulsiveness cloud your judgment.
(Suppressing the urge to confess her feelings) Decided? Then go ahead, Xiao Tian. I honestly don't think much of your choice.

question: #question#How should Xiao Ling respond to Xiao Tian to show she is consciously controlling her impulses?

dialog.content: Ah, I figured it out.
You figured it out?!
Actually, I wanted to give you that gift. But I couldn't find the right moment, so I had to use someone else to test your reaction.
You... why didn't you say so earlier, you jerk!
Wouldn't have been a surprise if I told you earlier, right?
Hmph, I'll forgive you!
After the confession, Xiao Ling smoothly started dating Xiao Tian, and they went on to enjoy sweet days together.
Thanks, hehe.
But to maintain boundaries, I'm going to block you.
Huh? When will you unblock me?
After you break up...
After Xiao Ling blocked Xiao Tian, they never contacted each other again.
Come on, stop teasing me.
Do you like her?
I can't say for sure.
Are you going to give it to her?
Exactly, that's why I came to ask you.

content.content: I have my own principles. I've already told you to think for yourself, so stop asking me! Your future is in your own hands.
Oh, I really can't answer that question for you. How about we think it over, or you could ask someone else for their opinion?
Actually, I think whichever you choose is fine, the important thing is not to regret it.
This is something you should have asked me earlier. I've already considered all the options and consequences for you; you just need to do as I say.

question: #question#How can Xiao Ling demonstrate her commitment to her goals?

content.content: Trust your own taste, just give something you like. As long as you choose with care, the other person will definitely feel your sincerity.
I trust you'll pick the right gift by yourself. Do you need my advice? Sometimes your choices can be too personal and might not meet the other person's preferences.

Oh dear, choosing a gift is quite a skill! I really do trust you, but you need to consider the other person's personality, hobbies, and your relationship with them. Are you sure you can manage all that?
Actually, I would prefer if you gave something I like. But since you asked me, I'd suggest choosing something I think the other person would like, because I trust my own judgment.

question: #question#How can Xiao Ling's response show her trust in Xiao Tian?

dialog.content: What's wrong with you, such a big temper.
We should stop contacting each other in the future.
Huh? What's going on?
No reason, don't ask. I'm going back, too tired.
Xiao Ling couldn't face her true feelings and, seeing Xiao Tian's inability to understand her emotions, could only distance herself from him in disappointment.
Alright then.
Ugh, I'm tired, I'm going to head home.
Huh, what's wrong with you?
Nothing, goodbye!
Xiao Ling appeared calm on the surface, but inside she was disappointed and quietly left Xiao Tian's life. The two gradually grew apart, a regrettable and lamentable situation.
